column2: T2/T3 Unlimited vCPU for Linux  RHEL and SLES:

column1: Amazon Elastic Load Balancing (US East (N. Virginia))

With an increased in available budget, I decided to increase performance by increasing the number of EC2s to 8. It was a compromise instead of upgrading the type of EC2. I also increased the number of RDSs and the Provisioned IOPS. I increased the storage capacity of the RDSs from 100GB to 200GB. The type of RDS was improved upon as well.
